post.author: Mike
post.title: The 2015 MileagePlus program - United AIrlines
post.content:
United Airlines is rolling out a few changes for their acclaimed award miles program. March 2015 marks the start of united airlines latest mileage plus program. earning award miles has never been easier with this simplified rewards program. whether you're new to earning or been building up rewards over the years, mileage plus is designed with you in mind. the upgrades are featured below in q&a format. feel free to use the contact us online help link for any additional questions. 



Earning Miles
The primary change you'll notice with MileagePlus involves earning miles. Using miles will stay primarily the same except you'll have more options for rewards. Those will be discussed in a separate section.

Who Will Be Affected By This Change
All rewards program participants will benefit from MileagePlus upgrades. These changes are universally standardized and effective worldwide.

Who Will Earn Miles If Someone Else Pays For My Ticket
As in the past, the ticketed passenger earns miles regardless of who makes the purchase. This policy remains unchanged.

How Can I Earn Award Miles
Most United and United Express tickets will earn you award miles. The award miles earned is based upon the amount paid for the ticket, in USD. If another currency is used to pay for a ticket, the amount will be converted into USD and then award miles will be calculated.

MileagePlus Partner Airlines
This new way of earning also applies to tickets for flights operated by Star Alliance or other MileagePlus partner airline, distinguished and identified with a ticket number beginning with "016."
Other tickets for flights not purchased through United, but still operated by Star Alliance or other MileagePlus partners and having ticket numbers that do not begin with "016" will earn miles based on the previous award miles program. Miles will be based on the distance flown and the purchased fare class.

Premier Qualifying Miles
You can still earn Premier qualifying miles (PQM) based on the distance of your flight. Premier members still earn a minimum of 500 PQMs on United and United Express flights shorter than 500 miles.

When Will Changes Take Place
Expect for all purchased tickets with departures starting on March 1, 2015 to begin earning awards under the new MileagePlus program.

How Are Award Miles Calculated
Actual mileage posting will be based upon the actual ticket price, purchase ticket routing, fare class, Premier status, residency and ticket issue date. Member level determines the number of points used to calculate award miles. Standard membership earns 5x; Premier Silver earns 7x; Premier Gold earns 8x; Premier Platinum membership earns 9x; and Premier 1K earns 11 times the actual ticket price.

When Is MileagePlus Status Calculated
You will earn miles based on MileagePlus status at time of departure.

Do Award Tickets Earn Award Miles
At this time, award tickets do NOT earn award miles.

Do Taxes and Fees Count Toward Award Miles
Only base fare price plus carrier-imposed surcharges paid will earn award miles. Government taxes or surcharges do not count towards award miles.

Is There a Maximum Number of Miles You Can Earn
You will be able to earn up to 75,000 award miles per ticket. There is, however, no minimum number of award miles you can earn per ticket.

Will Reward Miles Be Earned For United Travel Products
Reward miles will only be earned for ticket purchase price. This does not include Economy Plus seating or upgrades or checked baggage fees.

Will Reward Miles Be Earned For Discounted Tickets
Reward miles are earned based on the ticket purchase price, including those purchased using a percent-off or dollar-off coupon.

Will Buy-One Get-One Promotions Earn Reward Miles
Companion or secondary tickets do not earn reward miles. Only the primary ticket purchase will earn reward miles.

Will Specialty Tickets Earn Reward Points
Specialty tickets, such as a tour package, will earn miles based on a percentage of the distance flown and the purchased fare class on or after March 1, 2015.
Eligible class fares earning at 150% of distance on flight operated by United or United Express includes J, C, D, Z, P, F, A.
Eligible class fares earning at 100% of distance on flight operated by United or United Express includes Y, B, M.
Eligible class fares earning at 75% of distance on flight operated by United or United Express includes E, U, H, Q, V, W.
Eligible class fares earning at 50% of distance on flight operated by United or United Express includes S, T, L, K, G, N.
If applicable, Premier bonus awards will be based on member's Premier status and the lower of the distance flown or miles awarded.

Using Miles
How Can Award Miles Be Used
There's a reason MileagePlus has earned the acclaimed #1 ranking for seat availability among U.S. global carriers over the past five years in a row. Now, more than ever, the awards are incredible and numerous. Here is just a sneak peek at the benefits you can expect with award miles:

  • Economy Plus purchases on upcoming flights
  • Economy Plus annual subscriptions
  • Checked baggage subscriptions
  • Plus more to come
